data.description:
üî•üî•üî•The game has received its final update which **adds new puzzles and extends playtime for the Forsaken Asylum scenario**, and incorporates **minor fixes for the existing puzzles** in other scenarios.üî•üî•üî•

üß©**Experience puzzle adventures in Rooms of Realities!** üß©

Rooms of Realities offers **unique and well-balanced puzzles for solo or cooperative play with friends**! Enter the **mysterious levels** full of logic, mechanics, precision, memory, cooperation, cipher, and skill-based tasks! And don‚Äôt worry if you get stuck - our **smart, yet non-invasive hint system** is on hand to guide you back on track.


üîç **Play solo or with your friends!** üîç

With both **co-op and single-player modes available** solve all the puzzles by yourself or play with your friends! Work together, help each other and, what‚Äôs most important, communicate to finish the adventures.

üîç **Play 9 different chapters in 3 unique scenarios!** üîç

The game now **offers 9 chapters full of puzzles set in 3 different scenarios: an ancient pyramid, an underwater station, and a spooky asylum**. Each environment holds its own story and 3 atmospheric chapters to explore. Now in an improved version after the final update.

üîç**Get all the collectibles and take a photo in the victory room!** üîç

**Gather collectibles**, **earn trophies** for completing each scenario, and **commemorate your triumphs with a photo** in our victory rooms. These special sceneries will let you save all the best memories in one click.

changelog.change_log: - (Nemo's Mysterious Formula - Chapter 3) Fixed Issue: The wooden panels puzzle now correctly recognizes solutions when solved by two or more players.

- Fixed an issue where a domino piece was glued to the floor for some players in Chapter 2.
- Fixed an issue where the stone rings in the labyrinth were behaving uncontrollably.

- Fixed an issue that prevented players from entering the room in cooperative mode in Chapter 3.
- Fixed an issue where cranks didn't progress the puzzle in solo mode in Chapter 3.
